name: ITC Mughal, Agra
address: Taj Ganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: A tribute to Mughal architecture, this sprawling resort is set amidst 23 acres of lush gardens. It's a recipient of the prestigious Aga Khan Award for its Mughal-inspired design.

name: BrijRama Palace, Varanasi
address: Darbhanga Ghat, Dashashwamedh, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221001
about: One of the oldest structures in Varanasi, this palace hotel on the banks of the Ganges offers a unique heritage experience. It features traditional decor and stunning river views.

name: Hotel Clarks Shiraz, Agra
address: 54, Taj Rd, Agra Cantt, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: One of Agra's oldest and most well-known hotels, Clarks Shiraz offers a classic hospitality experience with views of the Taj Mahal from its revolving rooftop restaurant.

name: The Clarks, Varanasi
address: The Mall Rd, Cantonment, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221002
about: A landmark hotel in the Cantonment area, The Clarks offers a blend of modern amenities and traditional hospitality, providing a comfortable base to explore the ancient city.

name: Lebua Lucknow
address: 19, Sarva Palli, Saraca Estate, The Mall Avenue, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226001
about: Housed in a beautifully restored 1936 Art Deco bungalow, Lebua Lucknow offers a unique heritage experience that reflects the city's old-world charm and courtesy.

images.caption: Art Deco facade of the hotel

name: Hotel Kanha Shyam, Prayagraj
address: Civil Lines, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh 211001
about: A prominent hotel in the heart of Prayagraj, Hotel Kanha Shyam offers modern amenities and comfortable accommodation for pilgrims and business travelers alike.

name: Nidhivan Sarovar Portico, Vrindavan
address: Khasra No. 797, Gopalgarh Tehra Road, Vrindavan, Mathura, Uttar Pradesh 281121
about: Located in the holy town of Vrindavan, this hotel offers a serene and spiritual retreat. It's a modern hotel with traditional hospitality, ideal for pilgrims visiting the temples of Mathura and Vrindavan.

name: Manuallaya - The Resort Spa in the Himalayas
address: Sunny Side, Chadiyari, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175131
about: A magnificent resort in Manali with breathtaking views of the snow-capped Himalayas and the Beas river. It combines traditional Himachali architecture with modern luxury.

name: Fortune Park Dalhousie
address: Near Gandhi Chowk, Dalhousie, Himachal Pradesh 176304
about: Overlooking the picturesque Pir Panjal range, Fortune Park Dalhousie offers a comfortable and elegant stay with modern amenities and warm hospitality, reflecting the charm of the colonial era.

name: The Naini Retreat, by Leisure Hotels
address: Ayarpatta, Mallital, Nainital, Uttarakhand 263001
about: The former residence of the Maharaja of Pilibhit, this heritage hotel offers a panoramic view of the Naini Lake and the surrounding hills. It's a blend of colonial charm and modern comforts.

name: The Manu Maharani
address: Grassmere Estate, Mallital, Nainital, Uttarakhand 263001
about: A premium hotel in Nainital offering breathtaking views of the Naini Lake and the surrounding mountains. It combines modern luxury with old-world charm.

name: Jaypee Residency Manor
address: Barlowganj, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248122
about: Perched on a hilltop, this hotel offers a 360-degree panoramic view of the mighty Himalayas. It's a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and scenic beauty.

name: The Lalit Grand Palace Srinagar
address: Gupkar Rd, Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir 190001
about: A former royal palace, this hotel offers stunning views of the Dal Lake and is surrounded by meticulously manicured gardens. Experience the grandeur of Kashmiri royalty.

images.caption: View of the palace hotel and gardens

name: The Khyber Himalayan Resort & Spa
address: Hotel Khyber Rd, Forest Block, Gulmarg, Jammu and Kashmir 193403
about: A world-class resort located at an altitude of 8,825 feet in the Pir Panjal range of the Himalayas. It offers breathtaking views of the Apharwat peaks and is a stone's throw away from the Gulmarg Gondola.

images.caption: Heated indoor pool with a view

name: Mayfair Spa Resort & Casino
address: Lower Samdur Block, Ranipool, Gangtok, Sikkim 737135
about: A luxurious resort offering stunning views of the surrounding hills and valley. It features a world-class spa, a casino, and beautifully appointed rooms.

name: The Elgin Mount Pandim, Pelling
address: Monastery Rd, Pelling, Sikkim 737113
about: The former residence of the royal family of Sikkim, this heritage hotel offers magnificent views of the Kanchenjunga range. Experience old-world charm and warm hospitality.

images.caption: View of Kanchenjunga from the hotel

name: Yarlam, Lachung
address: Near Lachung Monastery, Lachung, North Sikkim, Sikkim 737120
about: A luxurious hotel in the remote and beautiful valley of Lachung. It offers modern comforts amidst pristine Himalayan landscapes, close to Yumthang Valley.

name: Hotel Summit Sobralia
address: Helipad Road, Upper Ghurpisey, Namchi, Sikkim 737126
about: A modern hotel offering panoramic views of the Kanchenjunga range and the Samdruptse statue. It provides a comfortable base to explore the cultural attractions of South Sikkim.

name: Mayfair Darjeeling
address: The Mall, Opposite Governor House, Chauk Bazaar, Darjeeling, West Bengal 734101
about: A heritage hotel that exudes old-world charm and elegance. It offers stunning views of the valley and the Kanchenjunga range, coupled with warm hospitality.

name: Sinclairs Siliguri
address: Pradhan Nagar, Mallaguri, Siliguri, West Bengal 734003
about: A premier hotel in Siliguri, offering excellent connectivity to the Himalayan region. It features spacious rooms, a beautiful swimming pool, and extensive banqueting facilities.

name: The Elgin Silver Oaks, Kalimpong
address: Rinking Pong Road, Kalimpong, West Bengal 734301
about: A luxury heritage hotel built in 1932, formerly the home of a wealthy British jute magnate. It offers stunning views of the Himalayas and a charming colonial ambience.

name: ITC Royal Bengal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Kolkata
address: 1, JBS Haldane Ave, Tangra, Kolkata, West Bengal 700046
about: A tribute to the cultural heritage of Bengal, this luxury hotel celebrates the region's spirit. It features grand architecture, exquisite dining, and state-of-the-art facilities.

images.caption: Grand facade of ITC Royal Bengal

name: The Windamere Hotel
address: Observatory Hill, Chauk Bazaar, Darjeeling, West Bengal 734101
about: One of the original heritage hotels of the Himalayas, Windamere has been a Darjeeling landmark since the 19th century. Experience the charm of the British Raj and stunning mountain views.

name: Heritage Madurai
address: 11, Melakkal Rd, Kochadai, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625016
about: Designed by the famed architect Geoffrey Bawa, this resort offers a unique blend of history and luxury, with temple-inspired design elements.

name: Sterling Ooty Fern Hill
address: No. 73, Kundah House Road, Fern Hill, Ooty, Tamil Nadu 643004
about: Perched on a hilltop, this resort offers panoramic views of the Nilgiri mountains and valleys. A perfect retreat for nature lovers.

name: The Carlton Kodaikanal
address: Lake Rd, Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu 624101
about: The only 5-star hotel in Kodaikanal located on the banks of the scenic Kodai Lake. It offers colonial charm and a range of activities.

name: Sterling Kodai Lake
address: 44, Gymkhana Road, Lake Road, Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu 624101
about: A beautiful resort overlooking the serene Kodai Lake. The resort's design is inspired by English country homes, offering a cozy and comfortable stay.

images.caption: Room with a view of the lake

name: The Lalit Temple View Khajuraho
address: Opposite Circuit House, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606
about: Overlooking the Western Group of Temples, this luxury hotel offers a serene retreat with modern amenities and stunning views of the UNESCO World Heritage site.
experiencesAndActivities: Sound and Light Show at temples

name: Syna Tiger Resort
address: Village-Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Umaria, Madhya Pradesh 484661
about: A luxury wildlife resort on the edge of Bandhavgarh National Park, offering an immersive jungle experience with cottages, machans, and personalized safari services.

name: Welcomheritage Golf View
address: Pachmarhi, Madhya Pradesh 461881
about: A heritage hotel that exudes colonial charm, set amidst lush green lawns. It offers a tranquil retreat in the heart of the Satpura hills.

name: Radisson Gwalior
address: Plot No 13-14, City Centre, Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh 474011
about: A modern hotel located in the city center, offering comfortable accommodations and a range of amenities for business and leisure travelers. It's a great base for exploring Gwalior Fort.

name: Jehan Numa Palace Hotel, Bhopal
address: 157, Shamla Hills, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462013
about: A 19th-century palace converted into a heritage hotel, Jehan Numa Palace exudes colonial charm and royal hospitality. Set on the slope of Shamla Hill, it offers a tranquil retreat.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Indore
address: 12, Scheme 94C, Ring Road, Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452010
about: A stylish hotel offering upscale amenities, including a rooftop pool and fine dining restaurants. It's a popular choice for business and leisure travelers in Indore.

name: MPT Amaltas, Pachmarhi
address: Near Bus Stand, Pachmarhi, Madhya Pradesh 461881
about: A comfortable and well-located hotel by MP Tourism, offering easy access to the main market and tourist spots. It's a great budget-friendly option for families.

name: The Fern Residency, Somnath
address: Near Somnath Bypass, Veraval, Gujarat 362266
about: An environmentally sensitive hotel, offering a comfortable stay close to the Somnath Temple. It's a great base for pilgrims and leisure travelers.

name: The House of MG, Ahmedabad
address: Opposite Sidi Saiyed Jali, Lal Darwaja, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380001
about: A premier heritage hotel in Ahmedabad, offering a unique blend of traditional Gujarati architecture and modern luxury. It features a textile gallery, a boutique, and authentic dining experiences.

images.caption: Courtyard of The House of MG

name: The Grand Bhagwati, Surat
address: Magdalla Circle, Dumas Road, Surat, Gujarat 395007
about: A landmark of luxury in Surat, The Grand Bhagwati (TGB) is known for its opulent design, expansive event venues, and a range of culinary experiences. Ideal for grand weddings and business events.

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Statue of Unity
address: Statue of Unity Road, Kevadia, Gujarat 393151
about: Located close to the Statue of Unity, Ramada Encore offers modern amenities and comfortable accommodation for tourists visiting the monument and its surrounding attractions.

name: Tent City Narmada
address: Dyke 4, Sardar Sarovar Dam, Kevadia, Gujarat 393151
about: Experience luxury tented accommodation near the Statue of Unity. Tent City Narmada offers a unique blend of nature and comfort, with cultural programs and activities.

images.caption: Luxury tents at Tent City Narmada

name: InterContinental Chennai Mahabalipuram Resort
address: 212, Nemeli Village, East Coast Rd, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 603104
about: A luxury beach resort on the scenic East Coast Road, offering stunning views of the Bay of Bengal. It features contemporary design, a beautiful pool, and expansive gardens.

name: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Rohini
address: Twin District Centre, Sector 10, Rohini, New Delhi, Delhi 110085
about: A modern business hotel located in North-West Delhi, connected to a mall. It offers comfortable rooms, extensive meeting facilities, and a rooftop pool with panoramic city views.

images.caption: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Rohini exterior

name: Holiday Inn Goa Candolim
address: Candolim, Bardez, Goa 403515
about: Located in the vibrant area of Candolim, this hotel is a short walk from the beach. It offers modern rooms, an outdoor pool, and is a great base to explore North Goa's attractions.

name: Radisson Blu Marina Hotel Connaught Place
address: G-59, Connaught Circus, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
about: A heritage hotel in the heart of Delhi, offering a blend of colonial charm and modern luxury. Its central location provides easy access to business hubs and historical sites.

name: Pullman New Delhi Aerocity
address: Asset No 02, GMR Hospitality District, IGI Airport, New Delhi, Delhi 110037
about: A premium hotel in the Aerocity complex, offering a blend of business and leisure with stylish rooms, multiple dining options, and extensive wellness facilities.

name: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach
address: Balraj Sahni Marg, Juhu Beach, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400049
about: A beachfront hotel on the vibrant Juhu Beach, offering stunning sea views. It features contemporary rooms, an outdoor pool, and a variety of dining options.

name: ibis Jaipur Civil Lines
address: Near Civil Lines Metro Station, Ajmer Road, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006
about: A smart and modern economy hotel, offering a comfortable stay for both business and leisure travelers. It's well-connected and provides easy access to Jaipur's main attractions.

name: Fairmont Jaipur
address: 2, Riico, Kukas, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302028
about: A luxury palace hotel that pays tribute to the Mughal dynasty and Royal Rajputs of yore. Nestled amongst the Aravalli hills, it offers opulent rooms, fine dining, and regal hospitality.

images.caption: The grand facade of Fairmont Jaipur

name: Sofitel Mumbai BKC
address: C 57, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bandra East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400051
about: A luxury hotel in Mumbai's central business district, blending French art de vivre with Indian culture. It offers elegant rooms, an outdoor pool, and multiple award-winning restaurants.

name: Novotel Kolkata Hotel and Residences
address: CF 11, Action Area 1C, New Town, Rajarhat, Kolkata, West Bengal 700156
about: Located in the smart city of New Town, this hotel is ideal for business and leisure travelers. It features modern rooms, a rooftop pool, and is close to the IT hub and shopping malls.

name: Mercure Goa Devaaya Retreat
address: Divar Island, Goa 403403
about: An Ayurveda and wellness retreat set on a peaceful island in Goa. It offers traditional Ayurvedic treatments, yoga sessions, and a serene environment for rejuvenation.

name: ibis New Delhi Aerocity
address: Asset Area 10, Hospitality District, Delhi Aerocity, New Delhi, Delhi 110037
about: A smart and modern economy hotel located in the Aerocity complex. It offers comfortable rooms, a vibrant social hub, and convenient access to the airport and business centers.

name: Novotel Ahmedabad
address: Iscon Cross Roads, Sarkhej - Gandhinagar Hwy, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380015
about: Located on the SG Highway, this hotel is a preferred choice for business travelers. It offers modern rooms, an outdoor pool, and easy access to corporate offices and shopping malls.

name: Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre
address: Near Hitec City, Kondapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081
about: A large, modern hotel adjacent to the Hyderabad International Convention Centre. It features spacious rooms, landscaped gardens, and extensive leisure and business facilities.

name: ibis Styles Goa Calangute
address: Survey 166, Naikawaddo, Calangute, Goa 403516
about: A vibrant and trendy hotel near Calangute beach. It offers colorful rooms, three swimming pools, and a fun atmosphere, making it ideal for a family holiday.

name: Novotel Chennai Chamiers Road
address: 11, Chamiers Road, Nandanam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600035
about: A contemporary hotel in the heart of Chennai's business and entertainment district. It offers modern rooms, a rooftop pool, and stylish dining options.

name: Mercure Hyderabad KCP
address: 6-3-551, Banjara Hills Main Rd, Irram Manzil Colony, Hyderabad, Telangana 500082
about: Located in the city's premium business and entertainment district of Banjara Hills. This hotel offers modern comfort, a rooftop restaurant, and great connectivity.

name: ibis Bengaluru City Centre
address: Plot No 30, Raja Ram Mohan Roy Road, Off Richmond Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027
about: A smart and modern economy hotel located in the heart of Bengaluru's central business district. Perfect for travelers looking for comfort and convenience.

name: Novotel Visakhapatnam Varun Beach
address: Beach Road, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530002
about: A stunning sea-facing hotel on the picturesque Beach Road. It offers panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal from every room, along with a large pool and multiple dining options.

name: Mercure Sriperumbudur
address: CP 8, Sipcot Industrial Park, Sriperumbudur, Tamil Nadu 602105
about: Located in the industrial hub of Sriperumbudur, this hotel is designed for the modern business traveler, offering comfortable rooms and extensive meeting facilities.

name: Grand Mercure Bengaluru at Gopalan Mall
address: 120-121, Swamy Vivekananda Rd, Nagavarapalya, C V Raman Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560093
about: An all-suite hotel located within a shopping mall, offering spacious accommodations with kitchenettes. It's ideal for both short and extended stays in Bengaluru.

name: Novotel Pune Nagar Road
address: Weikfield IT City Infopark, Viman Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
about: A contemporary hotel located close to Pune airport and major business hubs. It offers stylish rooms, an outdoor pool, and a range of dining options.

name: ibis Pune Viman Nagar
address: Survey No 32, Viman Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
about: A modern economy hotel offering a comfortable stay for business and leisure travelers. Located close to the airport and Phoenix Marketcity mall.

name: Grand Mercure Mysuru
address: 2203, 60, New Sayyaji Rao Rd, Nelson Mandela Circle, Mysuru, Karnataka 570021
about: Located in the heart of the city, this hotel celebrates the rich heritage of Mysuru. It offers well-appointed rooms, a rooftop pool, and is close to major attractions like Mysore Palace.

name: Novotel Chennai OMR
address: Old Mahabalipuram Rd, Sholinganallur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119
about: Located in Chennai's IT corridor, this hotel is ideal for business travelers. It offers modern rooms, an outdoor pool, and extensive meeting facilities.

name: Mercure Kooddoo Maldives
address: Gaafu Alifu Atoll, Kooddoo, Maldives
about: An island resort offering stylish villas, an outdoor pool, and easy access to diving spots. Accessible via a short domestic flight from Malé.

name: Banyan Tree Vabbinfaru, Maldives
address: Vabbinfaru Island, North Malé Atoll, Maldives
about: An all-pool villa resort offering a luxurious and intimate escape. Famous for its house reef, marine conservation lab, and world-class Banyan Tree Spa.

name: Angsana Velavaru, Maldives
address: South Nilandhe Atoll, Velavaru, Maldives
about: Known as 'Turtle Island', this resort offers a unique experience with its standalone InOcean Villas and vibrant marine life. Perfect for families and couples.

name: Raffles Udaipur
address: Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
about: A private island oasis in the middle of Udai Sagar Lake. Accessible only by boat, this ultra-luxury hotel offers unparalleled views, exquisite design, and the legendary Raffles Butler service.

images.caption: Aerial view of the island hotel

name: Mövenpick Hotel Colombo
address: 24 Srimath Anagarika Dharmapala Mawatha, Colombo 00300, Sri Lanka
about: A modern hotel in the heart of Colombo with a stunning rooftop infinity pool offering 360-degree views of the city and the Indian Ocean.

name: Sofitel Singapore City Centre
address: 9 Wallich St, Singapore 078885
about: A luxury hotel in the heart of the CBD, offering a blend of French art de vivre and local sophistication. It's directly connected to the Tanjong Pagar MRT station.

name: Banyan Tree Bangkok
address: 21/100 S Sathon Rd, Thung Maha Mek, Sathon, Bangkok 10120, Thailand
about: An urban oasis in the heart of Bangkok, this all-suite hotel is famous for its breathtaking rooftop bar, Vertigo, offering panoramic city views.

name: Fairmont Singapore
address: 80 Bras Basah Rd, Singapore 189560
about: Located in the heart of the city's arts and cultural district, this luxury hotel offers direct access to Raffles City Convention Centre and Shopping Centre.

name: Raffles Hotel Singapore
address: 1 Beach Rd, Singapore 189673
about: An iconic colonial-style luxury hotel that is a national monument. Experience the legendary Singapore Sling at the Long Bar and enjoy the timeless elegance.

name: Swissôtel The Stamford, Singapore
address: 2 Stamford Rd, Singapore 178882
about: One of Southeast Asia's tallest hotels, offering panoramic views of the city. It's located above City Hall MRT and part of the Raffles City complex.
